description: This file defines the LibraryScreen widget which displays user playlists and favorite songs, providing UI components for interacting with playlists and songs, including navigation to a PlayerScreen.

classes.name: LibraryScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays user playlists and favorite songs, allowing users to play songs and navigate to the player screen.

classes.name: _PlaylistCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a playlist card with name and songs, and navigates to the player screen when tapped.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the LibraryScreen, displaying playlists and favorite songs.

methods.name: _PlaylistCard.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the playlist card, showing playlist name and song count, handling tap to play playlist.
